altername_name: Tokimeki Memorial 2 Substories: Memories Ringing On
name: Tokimeki Memorial 2 Substories Vol. 3: Memories Ringing On
overview: Tokimeki Memorial 2 Substories: Memories Ringing On (ときめきメモリアル2 Substories Vol.3 Memories Ringing On) is a visual novel spin-off game of the Tokimeki Memorial 2 game. It was released for the PlayStation on August 30, 2001 in Japan.
